column4: hi, I've just set an extra partition with gparted, installed windows on it, and now when I set the linux partition as the active partition i just get 'Missing OS' at bootup, can anyone help?
do I need a live CD or something?
hi, I've just set an extra partition with gparted, installed windows on it, and now when I set the linux partition back as the active partition i just get 'Missing OS' at bootup, can anyone help?
did you install windows first or second?
second
you should install windows first
you'll need to reinstall grub
ahh I see
how can I do that without logging into ubuntu?>
do you have a live cd?
live cd?
I'm downloading one right now
i think running grub-install or some similar command you can reinstall grub
where do I run grub-install from? the live cd?
do you know what device your linux partition is.../dev/hda1, /dev/hdc1 and so on
yeah from a terminal in ubuntu
I think it's /dev/hda2
ok then 'grub-install /dev/hda2'
alright, thanks v. much for your help
omitting ' ' of course
k
